verses.verse: And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H834>steward<s%> <S%H5921><s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4390>Fill<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H376>men's<s%> <S%H572>sacks<s%> with <S%H400>food,<s%> as much <S%H834>as<s%> they <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H5375>carry,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in his <S%H572>sack's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

And <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H1375>cup,<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H1375>cup,<s%> in the <S%H572>sack's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6996>youngest,<s%> and his <S%H7668>corn<s%> <S%H3701>money.<s%> And he <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>
As soon as the <S%H1242>morning<s%> was <S%H215>light,<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> were sent <S%H7971>away,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> and their <S%H2543>asses.<s%>

And when <S%H1992>they<s%> were gone out <S%H3318>of<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> yet far <S%H7368>off,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H834>steward,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H6965>Up,<s%> <S%H7291>follow<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H376>men;<s%> and when thou dost <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them, <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> have ye <S%H7999>rewarded<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H2896>good?<s%>

Is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> it in <S%H834>which<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H8354>drinketh,<s%> and whereby indeed he <S%H1931>divineth?<s%> <S%H5172><s%> <S%H5172><s%> ye have done <S%H7489>evil<s%> in <S%H834>so<s%> <S%H6213>doing.<s%>
And he <S%H5381>overtook<s%> them, and he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> these <S%H428>same<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> <S%H1696>saith<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words?<s%> God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> should <S%H4480>do<s%> <S%H6213><s%> according to <S%H2088>this<s%> thing: <S%H1697><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H4672>found<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks'<s%> <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> we brought <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan:<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> then should we <S%H1589>steal<s%> out of thy lord's <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H113><s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2091>gold?<s%>

With <S%H854><s%> <S%H834>whomsoever<s%> of thy <S%H4480>servants<s%> <S%H5650><s%> it be <S%H4672>found,<s%> both let him <S%H4191>die,<s%> and <S%H587>we<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H5650>bondmen.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3651><s%> let <S%H1931>it<s%> be according unto your <S%H1697>words:<s%> he <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> it is <S%H4672>found<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and <S%H859>ye<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5355>blameless.<s%>

Then they <S%H4116>speedily<s%> took <S%H3381>down<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H572>sack<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and <S%H6605>opened<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H572>sack.<s%>

And he <S%H2664>searched,<s%> and <S%H2490>began<s%> at the <S%H1419>eldest,<s%> and <S%H3615>left<s%> at the <S%H6996>youngest:<s%> and the <S%H1375>cup<s%> was <S%H4672>found<s%> in <S%H1144>Benjamin's<s%> <S%H572>sack.<s%>
Then they <S%H7167>rent<s%> their <S%H8071>clothes,<s%> and <S%H6006>laded<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> for <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%> and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him on the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H4639>deed<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye have <S%H6213>done?<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> such a <S%H376>man<s%> as <S%H3644>I<s%> can certainly <S%H5172>divine?<s%> <S%H5172><s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall we <S%H559>say<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall we <S%H1696>speak?<s%> or <S%H4100>how<s%> shall we clear <S%H6663>ourselves?<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath found <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> we are my <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H587>we,<s%> and he <S%H1571>also<s%> with <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the <S%H1375>cup<s%> is <S%H4672>found.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that I should <S%H4480>do<s%> <S%H6213><s%> <S%H2063>so:<s%> but the <S%H376>man<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H1375>cup<s%> is <S%H4672>found,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and as for <S%H859>you,<s%> get you <S%H5927>up<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> your <S%H1>father.<s%>

Then <S%H3063>Judah<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%> unto <S%H413>him,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>Oh<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> let thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in my <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H241>ears,<s%> and let <S%H408>not<s%> thine <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burn<s%> against thy <S%H5650>servant:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou art even <S%H3644>as<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
My <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3426>Have<s%> ye a <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H251>brother?<s%>

And we <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> We <S%H3426>have<s%> a <S%H1>father,<s%> an old <S%H2205>man,<s%> and a <S%H3206>child<s%> of his old <S%H2208>age,<s%> a little <S%H6996>one;<s%> and his <S%H251>brother<s%> is <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> is <S%H3498>left<s%> of his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> him.
And thou <S%H559>saidst<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> Bring him <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, that I may <S%H7760>set<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him.

And we <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> The <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H5800>leave<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> for if he should <S%H5800>leave<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> his father would <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And thou <S%H559>saidst<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H518>Except<s%> <S%H3808><s%> your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you, ye shall <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> we came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> we <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of my <S%H113>lord.<s%>
And our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Go <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H7666>buy<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H400>food.<s%>

And we <S%H559>said,<s%> We <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> go <S%H3381>down:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> our <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3426>be<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> us, then will we go <S%H3381>down:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> we <S%H3201>may<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H369>except<s%> our <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> be <S%H854>with<s%> us.

And thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> us, <S%H859>Ye<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> my <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> me <S%H8147>two<s%> sons:

And the <S%H259>one<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> me, and I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> he is torn in <S%H2963>pieces;<s%> <S%H2963><s%> and I <S%H7200>saw<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5704>since:<s%> <S%H2008><s%>

And if ye <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> <S%H6440>me,<s%> and <S%H611>mischief<s%> <S%H7136>befall<s%> him, ye shall bring <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> my gray <S%H7872>hairs<s%> with <S%H7451>sorrow<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore when I <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> be <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> us; seeing that his <S%H5315>life<s%> is bound <S%H7194>up<s%> in the lad's <S%H5315>life;<s%>

It shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> with us, that he will <S%H4191>die:<s%> and thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall bring <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> the gray <S%H7872>hairs<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> with <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> became <S%H6148>surety<s%> <S%H853>for<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H4480>unto<s%> <S%H5973><s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, then I shall bear the <S%H2398>blame<s%> to my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3605>forever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> let thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> instead <S%H8478>of<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%> a <S%H5650>bondman<s%> to my <S%H113>lord;<s%> and let the <S%H5288>lad<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H251>brethren.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H349>how<s%> shall I go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> be <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me? lest <S%H6435>peradventure<s%> I <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall come <S%H4672>on<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1>father.<s%>
